abstract: Collective of anonymous, self-taught Syrian filmmakers known as Abounaddara has gained wide audience and won international acclaim with series of online videos documenting everyday life in country; shooting with micro-budgets and borrowed equipment, group aims to counteract mainstream depiction of Syria that tends to focus on conflict and hardship.
lead_paragraph: Abounaddara, with only one active named member amid its ranks, provides weekly dispatches it hopes will present an alternative to more violent mainstream coverage.

headline.main: Syrian Film Collective Offers View of Life Behind a Conflict
headline.print_headline: Life Behind the Scenes of a Conflict

snippet: Abounaddara, with only one active named member amid its ranks, provides weekly dispatches it hopes will present an alternative to more violent mainstream coverage.
